figure.head: Figure 1.
figure.figDesc:
The residual Hubble diagram for models 1–4. The black dashed line
presents Δm for the ΛCDM model.

figure.head: Figure 2.
figure.figDesc:
The distance deceleration parameter (left panel) and the volume
deceleration parameter (right panel) for models 1–4.

figure.head: Figure 3.
figure.figDesc:
The current density distribution (left panel) and deceleration parameter
(right panel) for model 5.

figure.head: Figure 4.
figure.figDesc:
The current density distribution (left panel) and volume deceleration
parameter (right panel) for models of cosmic structures (models 6, 7).

figure.head: Figure 5.
figure.figDesc:
The current density distribution (left panel) and deceleration parameter
(right panel) for model 8.
